node.label: extermal interfaces layer (fowler pattern: remote facade, GoF pattern: facade)
FEW interfaces FEW methods (with LARGE portions of information)
internal interfaces layer (Fowler pattern: gateways, service layers)
many interfaces many methods (with small portions of information)
- many calls is replaced by a single call to the facade - for example, in one call, you can insert just the object tree

- Suitable for remote access ( for example, SOAP Web Services, REST services) - Saving expensive (compared to local calls) calls through the slow channels per call is sent a lot of information at once - Large fa√ßade gives access to small interfaces
